member.name: M:PhoneBookApi.Controllers.PhoneBookController.GetPhoneBookItem(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a PhoneBook item matching the given id.
member.param: Id of item to be retrieved

member.name: M:PhoneBookApi.Controllers.PhoneBookController.PostPhoneBookItem(PhoneBookApi.Models.PhoneBookItem)
member.returns: Inserts new PhoneBook item in data.xml and saves the file

member.name: M:PhoneBookApi.Controllers.PhoneBookController.DeletePhoneBookItem(System.Int64)
